summary: A sharp love triangle is formed by a wealthy businessman.
cast: Josiane Balasko|Gérard Depardieu|Carole Bouquet|François Cluzet|Roland Blanche|Myriam Boyer|Denise Chalem|Didier Bénureau|Philippe Loffredo|Stéphane Auberghen|Jean-Louis Cordina|Jean-Paul Farré|Richard Martin|Philippe Faure|Juana Marques|Flavien Lebarbe|Catherine Gillet|Sylvie Orcier|Sylvie Simon
title: Demasiado bella para ti
